description:
Heavily wounded, Raphael warns Chastille of treacherous threats lurking within the Church. As For learns more about the man she has carried such hatred for, she must decide if revenge is truly something she wants anymore.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Still Apparently an Angelic Knight`s Duty to Slay Wicked Beasts
Największym zaszczytem dla Anielskiego Rycerza jest zwalczanie bestii zrodzonych z ciemności
Soredemo Jaaku na Mamono o Yattsukeru no ga Seikishi Rashii
Terrasser les créatures maléfiques est le devoir d’un chevalier saint
それでも邪悪な魔物をやっつけるのが聖騎士らしい
